questions.quote: Look at this Jerry, dropping paper on the ground. That's littering.
Nice shirt..  What is this? Is this what you wore on the show?
No one's stealing a tractor, it's a five-mile-an-hour getaway. We're dancing around the obvious, it's gotta be disfigurement.
How come he's gettin' so smart? I stopped having sex with Ben three days ago and I don't know no Portuguese?
Wait a minute. This looks familiar. This reminds me of something. I can do this.
I can't believe you told Kramer it's okay to put the cable in during the shower! Jerry, look,, look! They've eaten everything.
Y'know if the guy dies, the art could really be worth something...
The last couple a days he's been acting very strange. I think he's avoiding me.
Did I tell you I ran into her last week? Ho-ho, she looked great.
Oh, 'cos I made her this very special gift. 'Kay, it's a bouquet of paper from her TV Guide.
